snippet: Rick Santorum said that when he mentioned "emotions," he meant that men might be distracted from their mission by their natural instinct to protect women.
abstract: Rick Santorum said that when he mentioned "emotions," he meant that men might be distracted from their mission by their natural instinct to protect women.
lead_paragraph: After Rick Santorum said that women should not serve in combat, citing "emotions," critics were furious, saying he had insulted women by suggesting that they were too emotional to be depended upon in life-and-death situations.

headline.main: Santorum Clarifies Remarks on Women in Combat
